import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get purchase order by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/purchaseorders/{PurchaseOrderId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a single purchase order record by its unique identifier to view PO details, budget, and associated supplier information.

**Prerequisites**
1. **PurchaseOrderId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/purchaseorders](/docs/api/parts/list-purchase-orders) to list purchase orders, extract `Items[].PurchaseOrderId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List purchase orders: [GET /api/v1.0/purchaseorders](/docs/api/parts/list-purchase-orders) to find the target PO.
2. Fetch details: [GET /api/v1.0/purchaseorders/\{PurchaseOrderId\}](/docs/api/parts/get-purchase-order-by-id).
3. Update if needed: [POST /api/v1.0/purchaseorders/\{PurchaseOrderId\}](/docs/api/parts/update-purchase-order).

**Minimal Required Fields**: PurchaseOrderId (path).

**Note**: This endpoint is part of the legacy Parts module API which is deprecated.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"PurchaseOrderId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the purchase order.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
